item.description:
A few people have suggested we do a meetup here. I heard this is a good band so let's check it out.


The Old Yacht Club, Perched on the west bank of the Connecticut River, has been a proud land mark of Middletown for over almost ninety years.

Today, the Old Yacht Club is home to Harbor Park Restaurant, located in Middletown's riverfront Harbor Park.

Our guests can enjoy our beautiful water views - or dine by one of our heartwarming fireplaces. We assure you that whether you are making a reservation for an intimate dinner for two or planning the wedding day of your dreams our attentive and experienced staff will make your special occasion a success.


The Savage Brothers Band

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party with the Savage Brothers @ Harbor Park
